entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
